search_results.title: Allen Turner - Chicago - DePaul CDM
search_results.snippet: Allen Turner has been involved in storytelling, game and play design, and education in one way or another for most of his adult life.

search_results.title: About
search_results.snippet: Allen Turner teaches game design as a Professional Lecturer at DePaul ... He's an Afro-Indigenous game designer, storyteller, artist, dancer, author ...
